quotedTweet.content:
🚨 New Scam Exposed 🚨

Imagine a “nonprofit” that sells uncapped H-1B visas for profit, advertising indentured foreign workers anyone can sponsor for $4K a month to keep cap-exempt status.

❌ Cap-exempt H-1Bs let nonprofits and universities hire unlimited foreign workers

twitter.content:
A “non-profit” is pitching $4,000-a-month H-1Bs that bypass cap exemptions — instead of the official $100,000 USCIS fee. They’re literally selling guaranteed visas. Total scam.

@USCISJoe should investigate.

posts.author: RINO_fatigue
posts.title: A terrorist or unlawful combatant is an individual who engages in armed conflict but does not meet the requirements for lawful combatant status as those by the Geneva Conventions.   So formally designating antifa or CAIR as terrorist organizations isn't needed to treat their combatant as terrorists.
